(Just so you know, the Gateway can only be destroyed by something as powerf=
ul as Unicron, so it's around for a while.)

::Primal Prime/Wolveritron::

=
    "By Primus, no!" Prime said in reaction to the site of the Gateway. "Wh=
at is Unicron planning for this world?"
    He transformed to Vehicle mode =
and roared away, toward the Maximal base.
    Wolveritron heard Prime comin=
g and prepared to hop aboard. Just before Prime passed him, Wolveritron jum=
ped. A perfect landing.
    "Hey, Primey, What is that thing?" Wolveritron =
said wondering about the Gateway.
    "It is something I fear will be our d=
ownfall," Prime said.
    As they reached the base Wolveritron hopped off t=
ransforming as he hit the ground. Prime stopped and transformed.
    "Strik=
er, or any Maximal, please respond!" Prime yelled into his comm unit. "Code=
 One emergency! "
